products.description: All-in-one e-commerce platform to build and run online stores and sell across channels. Helps small and growing merchants launch shops, accept payments, and manage orders. Speeds time-to-market with scalable hosting and integrated commerce tools.

Enterprise-grade commerce platform for high-volume brands needing advanced customization and global expansion. Helps large merchants streamline operations, automate workflows, and scale storefronts. Designed to support complex, multi-channel businesses at scale.

Point-of-sale system for in-person retail that syncs sales, inventory, and customer data with your online store. Helps retailers deliver unified shopping experiences, speed checkouts, and manage stock across locations. Available with hardware and software options for stores.

Integrated payment processing that accepts cards and local payment methods directly in your store. Helps merchants simplify checkout, reduce reliance on external gateways, and reconcile transactions faster. Built into Shopify for streamlined setup and reporting.

Customer acquisition product that helps merchants find high-value buyers using aggregated merchant insights and lookalike audiences. Helps marketing teams run more effective ad campaigns to increase qualified traffic. Aims to lower acquisition costs and boost sales.

Financing program offering cash advances and loans to eligible Shopify merchants to fund inventory, marketing, or expansion. Helps businesses access growth capital quickly without lengthy bank processes. Repayment is tied to sales performance for flexible servicing.
